QuestData.Title: The Only Way to Travel
QuestData.Description: Call me cautious but I kept a few flares just in case we needed to quickly escape.$b$bI'm glad that wasn't needed but we could still use the ride back to the artillery tower.$b$bAre you ready $g sir:ma'am;?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Miall in Fort Wrynn.
QuestData.RewardText: The outpost is now fully up and running and we have enough material to outfit an army - your army!
